p: Various other novel HCV NS5B polymerase inhibitors have recently been discovered such as pyrano [3,4-b] indole based inhibitors, tricyclic 5,6-dihydro-1H-pyridin-2-ones, benzothiadiazine and 1,4-benzothiazine, 4-(1 /,1 /dioxo-1 /dihydro-1 /Î» 6-benzo [1 /,2 /,4 /] thiadiazin-3 /-yl)-5-hydroxy-2H-pyridazin-3-ones, Pyrrolo [1,2-b] pyridazin-2-ones, 2-(1,1-dioxo-2H-[ 1, 2, 4] benzothiadiazin-3-yl)-1-hydroxynaphthalene derivatives, pyrano [3,4-b] indole. (Structures are cited in figure 2).
